content: Refreshing honesty. I was so overwhelmed and lost with the book I was writing that I took a break from long format to write short memoir pieces. All along I’ve been feeling guilty that I’m not working on the big one, but this was a necessary step to master some tools of the craft. Congratulations on having finished the first draft of your book, suffering through the edit, daring to cut half and having an awesome wife that can edit. Very good luck with your book!
